snippet: Steve Reich’s “WTC 9/11,” performed on Tuesday at Le Poisson Rouge, was an intensely personal account of the tragedy.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by the American Contemporary Music Ensemble at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: Steve Reich’s “WTC 9/11,” performed on Tuesday at Le Poisson Rouge, was an intensely personal account of the tragedy.

headline.seo: American Contemporary Music Ensemble at Le Poisson Rouge
headline.main: Combining Taped Voices From 9/11 and Live Strings
headline.print_headline: Combining Taped Voices From 9/11 and Live Strings
